text: usakee qaum ke saradaar, jinhonne inakaar kiya aur aakhirat ke milan ko jhoothalaaya aur jinhen hamane saansaarik jeevan mein sukh pradaan kiya tha, kahane lage, "yah to bas tumheen jaisa ek manushy hai. jo kuchh tum khaate ho, vahee yah bhee khaata hai aur jo kuchh tum peete ho, vahee yah bhee peeta hai
